org.ejbca.core.protocol.ws.client.gen

Class ExtendedInformationWS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.protocol.ws.client.gen.ExtendedInformationWS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ExtendedInformationWS
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to represent extended information in userdata in the WebService API.
     
    Example code:
       UserDataVOWS user = new UserDataVOWS ();
   user.setUsername ("tester");
   user.setPassword ("foo123");
     .
     .
     .
   List<ExtendedInformationWS> ei = new ArrayList<ExtendedInformationWS> ();
   ei.add (new ExtendedInformationWS ("A name", "A value));
   ei.add (new ExtendedInformationWS ("Another name", "Another value"));
     .
     .
   user.setExtendedInformation (ei);
    Version:
    $Id: ExtendedInformationWS.java 19902 2014-09-30 14:32:24Z anatom $
    Author:
    Anders Rundgren
    See Also:
